title: Starbucks Workers in Boston Area Want to Unionize After Buffalo Victory
sub_head: Attempts to organize at the coffee company are spreading to additional markets
body:
Starbucks Corp . workers at two locations in the Boston area want to unionize, days after workers at a store in Buffalo, N.Y. voted in favor of unionizing and a sign that attempts to organize at Starbucks stores are spreading across the country.
“We believe that this is the best way to contribute meaningfully to our partnership with the company,” two organizing committees representing the Boston-area Starbucks stores wrote in a letter to Starbucks Chief Executive Kevin Johnson.
